overview: April is a babysitter who's been waiting too long for the adults to return. The husband owes more than a lift for making her wait. Jessie is a babysitter who loves putting on the wife's fancy lingerie. She also loves when the husband takes it off. Riley's fallen on the job, so she doesn't hear the husband trying to come inside from the rain. Since he's already wet, she might as well be too. Sensi tried to bake a nice cake for the man of the house, but he's got an appetite for something even sweeter. The couple is late because the babysitter hasn't shown up. The wife leaves early, and the Husband gets a special treat from Ashlynn for his patience.
tagline: Top porn stars in real life scenarios!
title: Babysitter Diaries 7
